original_text: To one who strikes you on the cheek, offer the other also, and from one who takes away your cloak do not withhold your tunic either.
korean_text: 너의 이 뺨을 치는 자에게 저 뺨도 돌려대며 네 겉옷을 빼앗는 자에게 속옷도 거절하지 말라

sentences.original_text: To one who strikes you on the cheek,
and from one who takes away your cloak
do not withhold your tunic either.
